website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of stemless glasses that offer a unique look from what you'd typically expect.
pros: These eight-ounce glasses are a good size, and the thicker glass makes these dishwasher safe
Customers love the substantial weight of these glasses, which makes them unlikely to tip over
This four-piece glass set is a good value, even if the glasses aren’t perfect
cons: A few customers noted imperfections in the glass that may make the rim uneven

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation and DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after I broke my partner’s martini glass stemware and was downgraded to a stainless steel martini glass. My partner made fun of me for buying them, however, since we got them he began using them for Manhattans and the presentation with a sphere of ice is BEAUTIFUL. Highly recommend for those who need more stability when they’re drinking a cocktail and don’t want to let anyone else in on their secretive clumsiness.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Golden

customer_reviews.title: Ooh la la. Sexy Bar Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape. Solid in hand. They call these martini glasses but I have plans to serve margaritas and cosmos in them! Clear glass and well made; great addition to my new wine and beverage bar. These will be on display in my lighted glass front kitchen cabinet. Quick ship and great follow-up customer service. Highly recommend and will check out the other bar things this seller has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The glasses are beautiful. They were well packaged and arrived safely
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are beautiful. They were well packaged and arrived safely. Just the perfect size for a tasty Dirty Martini.
customer_reviews.author: ADINAO

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are perfect. I can't wait to use them
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect. I can't wait to use them. I love Martini's but have a hard time transporting the long stem martini glasses in our RV which is why I ordered these. I previously ordered the Libbey 4-piece cocktail glasses and they arrived to me all completely broken. There was absolutely no protective packaging in the box of Libbey's. I returned them and ordered these and the packaging is a difference of night and day. I'm happy to report I now have 4 useable glasses and not a box of shattered glass pieces. Spend the extra few cents and order these!
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice martini glasses, great for any high-ball.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar-set, we love them. Nice size, very well balanced and weighted so they are stable and comfortable to hold and handle. We bought them mainly for martinis but they are also super for a bourbon, scotch or any moderately sized bar drink (they hold several shots with/without mixer and ice). Just love the stylish shape and their stability with the heavier bottom. Real glad we found these to buy.
customer_reviews.author: K-Sky

customer_reviews.title: Very classy stemless glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love "the feel" of these glasses - I feel very classy holding and sipping from this glassware. I also agree with many other reviewers that without the stem they are easier to use, wash in dishwasher, and store. Looking forward to using them in RV next time we hit the road.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyB

customer_reviews.title: We ordered one set of these glasses and liked them so much we ordered a second set for ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one set of these glasses and liked them so much we ordered a second set for our RV. They are the perfect size for a martini. The bottoms are heavy. We leave them in the freezer so they will be frosted for our drinks. We love that they are compact to store and won't easily tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Attractive with a quality  feel
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses with a substantial weight. Perfect for old school cocktails. Fits comfortably in my small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: just a bit annoying. Reading the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are okay. They feel solid and stable, but all four of the have at least one bump or wave in the top rim that is unsightly, but won't effect the functionality. One of the glasses also has a tiny jagged/pokey imperfection on the outside of the rim (like one of the tiny bubbles popped while the glass was drying?)- very tiny, not likely to effect the functionality, just a bit annoying. Reading the other reviews, seems like I may have just got a bad batch. Probably not worth the hassle to return them, but probably wouldn't buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally fell apart, all on it's own.
customer_reviews.text: I liked these glasses but didn't use much. However today, as I was picking one up to wash it, the bottom literally fell off slicing my thumb on the way. It didn't knock into anything or get handled roughly at all, literally just fell apart. Of course it is outside the return window. Hate to throw anything away but these are far too dangerous to let anyone use.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: So chic and modern-looking!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these martini glasses! I bought two stemmed glasses a while back, but they just seemed too fragile and delicate for my clumsy self. Enter this beautiful set of four, which are not only high-quality, but come at an incredible price. What a value! And there is something decidedly contemporary about the stemless design, which I find super appealing.
customer_reviews.author: cjs.

customer_reviews.title: nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are nearly perfect to me. I've been looking for a martini glass that I couldn't spill so easily and these seemed like a perfect fit. They don't feel flimsy like a typical martini glass. The packaging was great, glasses are great quality. Yes, there is a lump on the rim but I barely noticed it. I only noticed it, because I was looking for it since I read some of the other reviews. It's no big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: melissa taylor

customer_reviews.title: Uneven glass and bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: They aren’t made well, they look like cheap glass and individual glasses don’t really match perfectly. First set had a terrible excess sharp piece of glass on the inside of a glass, got a replacement too bad I had to send back the original immediately because I could have swapped out a few to actually have a set of ok glasses. Not worth the hassle of returning a second time. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luv my little kitty

customer_reviews.title: Awful glasses. Filthy and full of scratches on every glass!
customer_reviews.text: I had reservations about buying these glasses on a lighting deal this weekend after seeing so many negative reviews which were all consistent. My order is the same. All 4 glasses are filthy with some sort of film on them like they had been stored in a garage for 50 years. There are hairline scratches all over each glass. There is also that puckering defect on the rim of the glasses as others have stated. My question is does this company have any sort of quality control? How did they even get packaged the way they look. This item should be pulled from Amazon site as it is an inferior product. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Tilting, uneven glasses, And it’s so obvious :(
customer_reviews.text: I want to love these glasses so badly, but it is so obviously slanted its ridiculous. These would be the perfect martini and margarita glasses, if the slant was not there! Luckily, none of the ones I received were cracked or had deformities on the rim, but it’s very disappointing to have such an uneven glass. I would love to return these and get some straight, perfect glasses, but I know that most likely that won’t be the case. Would love to receive some perfect glasses, because I would love to buy another set...
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Are these factory seconds?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as an alternative to traditional Martini glasses for our home bar. When I unboxed them I was shocked to find the first one with a rippled edge and imperfections in the lip. I figured that it must have been a de defect that somehow made it out of the factory. Sadly ALL 4 glasses have serious imperfections in the lips and arrived filthy dirty. They look terrible and I will not be using them. I am so disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K0PIE

customer_reviews.title: Hope I don't Break These!
customer_reviews.text: I like my Martinis,however the typical Martini glass is fragil. Bought some inexpensive plastic long stem and the opening to the stem is not sealed. Smaller olives get stuck in the opening. Yeah,I know,use a toothpic or larger olives but still. For most of the time I was using "on the rocks" tumblers. These are sturdy and unlikely to get tipped as the long stem ones do! These Essential Martini glasses are nice. I've only used one so far. The glass seems rather thin so I am uncertain of the durability. Bought these mainly for the claim os being usable in "hi-usage areas". Not expecting them to be unbreakable but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bourassa

customer_reviews.title: Not elegant, but serviceable and durable (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Our long stemmed, top heavy martini glasses broke one by one until there were no more. I be went back to the store where I'd purchased them at a great price to find only plastic martini "glasses". No way!!!! The existing reviews for these glasses persuaded me to give them a try. I have no regrets. They were packed very carefully and I always keep a couple in freezer so they are well chilled for whenever the mood strikes. The heavy solid glass bottom keeps my drink cold for as long as I want to sip and also lends stability even if you get tipsy.
customer_reviews.author: Older_but_Wiser

customer_reviews.title: They make my homemade martini's feel fancy
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in a nice giftable box, well package and seem to be of a good quality. I have only drank martini's in them and hand washed them but I will be putting them in the dishwasher soon as the ad said they were dishwasher safe. If they survive the dishwasher then I will really love them. I like the style of these. I feel like traditional stem martini glasses are very easy to break and knock over and these definitely feel more sturdy. They cheered me up during the pandemic while we wait for our usual watering holes to re-open.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Overall ok, but scratches
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style of these glasses and have found them easy to use and hold. However, when I opened the box I noticed each glass had tiny scratches all over the inside of the glass. For the price, and casual use, they will be fine. I would not recommend them as a gift due to the scratches, but for a cheap cocktail glass they are sufficient. Again, the scratches are very tiny and easily overlooked (but all over) if you aren't looking for something fancy.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Not flawless
customer_reviews.text: There were 2 options - a bit cheaper one from a different seller and this. I went with order of this, a bit higher priced, but I thought that's fine, probably the glasses are more flawless. Disappointing. 2 of them have stomach, one of them the bottom is uneven. Very far from being a nice flawless glasses. One of the glass had multiple little broken chips inside, I inspected very carefully the glass but none of them was chipped or broken, so it must be coming at the time of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: shape-stability
customer_reviews.text: With the on going craze of martinis; I have found many of my friends do not like using martini glasses with the long stems. Tip easy; and look very fragile. So I went with these low and heavy base. They are perfect. Now friends that had passed on my new found love of martinis are actually trying them.... Only one negative: The glasses are not perfectly round; they have a slight irregular shape to the cone part of the glass. Sort of gives it a quirky look...but I don't mind...for the price I paid they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Djcab

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these glasses.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a set of cocktail glasses to replace an older set of stemmed glasses. My wife had trouble trying to hold stem glasses due to arthritis in her hands. These glasses are much easier for her to hold. They are also very sturdy and unlikely to tip over as stemmed glassed can do. I like that they hold eight ounces and make for a good sized gimlet. I recommend these glasses highly. I almost forgot to mention that they came in a very nicely designed box for the 4 glasses which was then in a shipping box. Very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: mainer4

customer_reviews.title: Margaritas, Gimlet, Martini, you name it!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so much lovelier that I expected! I love how sturdy they are especially, but they look really fabulous no matter what you serve in them. I used them for a small cocktail party and we made margaritas, gimlets, and martinis. They were the perfect glass for all the mixed drinks we served and my guests even commented how much they liked that they were stemless because they were so much easier to use. Also, the seller shipped them super fast and they showed up right on time.
customer_reviews.author: SueK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and practical martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've started making martinis lately, and managed to break a few of the traditional martini glasses in a month, the ones with those long, thin, delicate stems. I had seen stemless martini glasses at a few bars (I imagine bars go through glasses even more than I can) and decided to give them a try. Ordered a set of Joy Jolt stemless and they fit the bill perfectly. They hold as much as a traditional glass, but are sturdy. They can even be put in the dishwasher, which is key. And, as important, they look good.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Instantly breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Not one but two of these broke with in 3 hours of being taken out of the package. I opened them, hand washed them and put them on the rack to dry. A few hours later we made cocktails. While drinking from them, two of them cracked and fell into two pieces. The bottom completely detached and margarita was all over the sofa , me and the carpet. :-(. Save your money, and your sofa and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of these glasses. I was hoping they were a bit smaller, although 8 oz. isn't a huge amount. There appears to be no quality control as the glass is thick in some areas and very fine in others, as well as a miniscule difference in height. 2 of the glasses wobble endlessly. For the occasional after dinner cocktail they are OK. Glad I only purchased 1 set.
customer_reviews.author: Prairie Princess

customer_reviews.title: terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews mentioning rim defects- bubbles and zits, but I ordered anyway. That was a mistake as 3 of the 4 glasses have large zits on the rim where the glass isn't smooth. One glass also has a heavy scratch. I'll be returning these and will look for better quality as these are the worst glasses I've ever seen. These really are that bad. The glass is also quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: Steve_in_TN

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for and I'm happy about it...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great workhorse of a glass. Is it a perfect specimen of glassware with no flaws? No, and I knew that going in. But, it's a very pretty glass, sturdy, is not going to tip over due to a long stem, fits very well in the dishwasher (yes, dishwasher safe!) and cupboard, and is economical enough that I am not fearful of it traveling out to the patio. The design is very charming and I love these glasses and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: KarenLML

customer_reviews.title: Breakage
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great idea and very hand friendly - when I placed the glasses in the dishwasher for cycling one came out with a broken stem. From the top of the "stem" diagonally about 2/3 down to the other side. Not sure if it was a fluke or a weakness in the glass stem itself - but now I only have 3, as you can't buy just one as a replacement glass :( i.e. the reason for the low "sturdiness" and "giftable" scores.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and not unattractive
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with these cocktail glasses, despite that they are obviously just glass. Unlike the Riedel and other stemless Swedish crystal we have, the heavy base keep these glasses from toppling over. I'm willing to give up the attractiveness of the Riedel and short crystal glasses for the sturdier Joy Jolt Afina.
customer_reviews.author: Chapel Hill Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Nice low profile, solid feeling cocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: I just received my glasses, so I can't comment on their durability. I have had a similar set (different manufacturer) of these since 2017 and I really like them. Does exactly what a stemmed glass does without the worry about accidentally tipping them over. I have finally chipped the rims on 2 of my other set so I decided to get 4 more. I ordered from JoyJolt Afina as the price was better.
customer_reviews.author: RustyS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for Martinis!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these.... I love the product, size of the glass, easy to clean, fits comfortably in your hand while consuming a beverage and how easily they fit in the liquor cabinet! I am sad to add that when placing one of the glasses in the cabinet, the entire rim broke off. And yes, this was placed just as easily as the others. I will continue to enjoy the remaining 3 glasses I have though and keep my fingers crossed that this was just a one off!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to order martini glasses without long stems. Love the old fashioned martini glass! Ordered these because I could put them in the dishwasher. They are GREAT. Sleek, stylish and easy to hold and use. Also go right into the dishwasher! They can be put in the freezer for a really cold glass without worry they will get broken. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: lisaniebs

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses but 2 arrived broken!
customer_reviews.text: I gave them 4 stars because 2 of my glasses arrived broken. But the 2 that remained were indeed what I was looking for in a glass! I have a number of high-end crystal martini glasses and because of their delicate nature have had so many end up with chipped lips. These glasses are great, they are sturdy and perfect for a quick martini.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Banks

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of glasses and chose these glasses because they looked great and appeared to be sturdy. Now that they have arrived and we have had a chance to use them, we are very happy with our purchase. They are definitely sturdy and they look very sophisticated. They were packed very well with no damage. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: happy gardener

customer_reviews.title: Non traditional martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you probably never understood the allure of the stemmed martini glass. This set makes a great replacement and can also be used for desserts. Lacking the stem helps the glass fit inside the refrigerator for those chilled desserts. Another great wedding or housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: I lifted the glass out of the cabinet and it neatly separated from the base..left with a martini top. disappointed. *UPDATE* 1 week later, another glass broke, followed by the 3rd one a few days later. I swear it’s almost like they were perfectly timed to break after the return window. Unfortunate. They were really impressive in the design, just sucked in their actual usability.
customer_reviews.author: CrownedCurls

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these glasses. Recently got into making cocktails at home and they're dramatically upping the visual appeal of my drinks already. The body of the glasses feel light and a little delicate, but the thick bases are heavy enough that I'm never afraid they're going to tip over on their own.
customer_reviews.author: ColinM

customer_reviews.title: Nice to look at, stable, but quite a bit more fragile than expected...
customer_reviews.text: three of my four glasses are broken three months out. My guess is they are fairly fragile and can't survive a trip a through the dishwasher. If you can commit to hand cleaning them, you might be ok. [Joyjolt sent me a new set; we will see how this set does. I've given them another star for good customer service]
customer_reviews.author: hb-497

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a box of four glasses about a year ago. We use them for our martinis and they are perfect! The other night as I was washing one, I dropped it and it broke, and the first thing I did was purchase four more so we could have our complete set for when we have company!
customer_reviews.author: Tami O

customer_reviews.title: Imperfections and bumps on the edges of all four glasses
customer_reviews.text: The rims of ALL FOUR glasses had bumps and imperfections. I returned them, as I didn't want my guests to feel noticeable ridges and bumps with their tongues and lips when having drinks with me at my house. I would have asked for an exchange, but I have learned that most of the time, if all four glasses in a set have problems, then it's usually a manufacturer issue, and I would likely get another set of four with different bumps, etc. I'll just purchase glasses that I can inspect prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hello from Corona, CA

customer_reviews.title: Great Cocktail Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great. got tired of the typical stemmed Martini glasses, too fragile! these are very sturdy, nice base, much easier to handle, and drink out of. Very good quality for the money. Would definitely buy again, or purchase as a gift! Arrived on time, good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: LEF

customer_reviews.title: Came defective & very dirty
customer_reviews.text: While these feel fairly sturdy glasses - they came SO dirty.. and even after cleaning they weren't perfect. They also came with little mini scratches that almost look like little spider webs within the glass. Can't feel them from the outside or inside. Would not buy again and would love a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and stable
customer_reviews.text: Did not want the long stemmed type of martini glass because they break so easy. These are nice and stable and have a good weight to them and have the classic martini glass shape. They arrived on time and were packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and stable
customer_reviews.text: I am a klutz so I like how these are not tall with a stem. They are very stable. The base is very thick, I wish the rest of the glass was a little thinker also, as I fear they will still break easily. Nice price. I saw a larger set at an even cheaper price but I needed the free two day shipping for an upcoming party that this set offered.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, functional glassware
customer_reviews.text: We needed some sturdy, relatively inexpensive glassware for the rare occasions when we serve cocktails such as martinis and these glasses fit the bill. The design is a little different from the mass-market competitors, a feature that will help differentiate our cocktail party "products."
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Martini Glass!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, perfect size, and big hit when used. I do not personally care for the long stem martini glasses so these are perfect and have some weight to them. They are easy to wash and I never feel like I could break them at any minute... I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amart

customer_reviews.title: RIFE WITH MANUFACTURING DEFECTS
customer_reviews.text: I am greatly disappointed in the overall quality of this item because of what obvious manufacturing defects, including major distortions in the glass and rim defects. Photos show a beautiful, distortion free glass with no imperfections, but those photos are not representative of product I received. This item is totally unacceptable, and I am returning it the same day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikul

customer_reviews.title: I like the product very much except one of the four ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much except one of the four cups game with a very sharp piece of glass at the bottom of the cup. It was probably a manufacturing defect but it essentially is unusable because of that. Disappointed in the quality of the product. Update: The seller was kind enough to send me a replacement cup. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying My Martini
customer_reviews.text: These glass martini glasses are sturdy and well designed. Arrived quickly despite the current delays in all shipping. Was surprised, though at how DUSTY the product was (glasses dusty). They washed up fine; just thought it was odd. Well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon 4 Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice Modern Martini glass.. great for absinthe to
customer_reviews.text: A really great glass.. perfect size for an absinthe spoon too.. Glass is well made not to thin. The base makes it very hard to to which is great for when your drinking. Nice shape..and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Tolodziecki

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional, good looking glassware
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are exactly what I need after my pet broke my good ones. These are sturdy and dishwasher safe. I would not use them as a gift if it was something special like a wedding but they’re great for every day use in a busy household.
customer_reviews.author: EJW

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, wash carefully.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to break, I've broken two already while hand washing. Would not recommend or purchase again. NEW: I received a new set of 4 glasses today, unrequested by me, along with a nice letter conveying their apologies for my bad experience with their glasses. I updated my review because of the high level of customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck P.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to stemware for martinis and cosmos
customer_reviews.text: Sure, we love our stemware. But, there are times these glasses are more practical because they aren't as prone to being tipped over or spilling when our guests are active and moving around. We still use stemware, but we insert these glasses into the mix from time to time. We're really happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: rscearcy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold!
customer_reviews.text: In these Covid times, my husband and I have a Stay-at-home Date Night each Friday. He likes martinis and I like wine. These glasses are perfect for both. Love how easy they are to hold. Love how sturdy they are. Love how they look. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Wills

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses but they were dirty as if someone used them then returned. I wanted to keep them so I soaked them in hot soapy water then washed them again in more hot soapy water. They came out looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: MrsR

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The rim of each of the four glasses is beaded and uneven. If I run my finger around the rim each it is a bumpy uneven scalloped edge. When I unpackaged and held each glass up, I noticed that each was water spotted, which made me wonder if I received a product that had been returned at some point. I’ve repackaged and am going to return for refund. It’s a shame as I truly like the design of the glasses and they appear to be well weighted but the quality is so poor I wouldn’t use myself much less my guests.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Rice-Healy

customer_reviews.title: Update: Too fragile and grimy
customer_reviews.text: Originally, this item broke while being hand washed prior to any usage, and there was a thick film of grime on all surfaces that wasn't easily removed with a single wash. Update: After I returned the product to the seller, I received a new product practically the next day. I ran them through the dishwasher and they came pretty clean. I have yet to use them, as they were for the lake cabin, and I haven't made martinis there yet. Glasses are a great design, and I look forward to using them soon. I will give grand kudos to the seller, as their customer service was fabulous. Thanks for that!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Young

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These looked like they had been the display pieces in a store, and then were boxed up for sale. The glasses were dusty, and all of them had small cracks, they looked like snowflake cracks with small lines. Disappointed and returned the item, will buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Not top heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty glasses and are not top heavy like typical martini glasses. The bottom is nice and heavy and they sit very nicely. The glass on top is thin and I'll have to be careful! Very pretty though and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good cocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are solid and seem dishwasher safe, which is why I got them as an alternative to the long-stem classic martini glasses I have, which are more difficult to wash and vulnerable to breaking if put in the dishwasher. They feel good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Tullius Wardo

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Received item exactly as pictured and described. These glasses are perfect for lemon drops, especially if you don't like using stemmed martini glasses. Would have given 5 starts, but one of the glasses has an imperfection on the lip of the glass (a glass pimple).
customer_reviews.author: sirius1nWA

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a part of a gift for my roommate and she loved them. I used them to make margaritas the other day, and they're the perfect size for cocktails. I'm really into stemless glassware lately, and these are sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.author: jjbanana

customer_reviews.title: One was broken, but customer service made it right
customer_reviews.text: One was broken, but they are nice glasses. I’m going to reach out to the seller and update later. **Update: this is my first time contacting Amazon customer support. In a short time I was talking to an actual live person who refunded me the cost of the glasses so I can order another set! Awesome customer service! As for the glasses, they are a nice size and a very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Smith

customer_reviews.title: martini, anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! Holds a nice sized martini. We received the glasses and had to break them in immediately. Our Lemon Drop Martinis were extra delicious in these great, easy to hold glasses. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: annika700

customer_reviews.title: Imitation is the best form of flattery!
customer_reviews.text: We visited some friends who had very similar glasses. All of us said how beautiful and functional they were. When we got home, I ordered some for myself. I had a dinner party for 8 people and they all commented on the glasses. They're not only fun and pretty, but they're also sturdy and fit in the dishwasher very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Solid yet elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good martini glass for serving chocolate espresso martinis, but have giant dogs, and much more dangerous for any glassware - 2 cats! These glasses are well made and solid, but very elegant, heavy enough that my cats can't bat them off the table, since anyone with cats knows anything on something MUST be knocked off - and without the stem, my 155 lb dog's rudder of a tail has yet to flip them over! Now, I have the benefit of a beautiful martini glass, with lots of broken bits and spilled messes! Everyone is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Lee in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Nice but quality control could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. Will use for my cosmopolitans. However, one arrived with a rough and a bit jagged lip. I was able to gently file it down so it can be iced to drink from without injury.
customer_reviews.author: Candice K Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic glasses...love them...like being on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these glasses! We decided to make dirty vodka martinis because that’s what we drank on our cruises. We kiss our cruises and decided to try to relive our last cruise by having our favorite drinks in special glasses! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Joy Jolt cocktail glasses are perfect for clumsy drinkers
customer_reviews.text: I have some beautiful stemmed martini glasses but I wanted something for everyday use. The Joy Jolt Afina cocktail glasses are perfect. I often have a drink before dinner and while I'm watching the news on TV. And I set my glass on the arm of a chair. I've broken several stemmed glasses doing this. The Joy Jolt glasses are perfect for this because they have no stems, just a sturdy round base.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Cheers
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are similar to those at your local pub, but not as “heavy”. Even thou, the glasses are still eloquent and robust enough for cocktails on the patio or in the home. They add to our celebrations and enjoyment with their shape and style. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I like these glasses
customer_reviews.text: My father-in-law likes his evening martinis, so I bought these to have for he visits. I like the feel of them over the stem glasses. I always feel like I will end up knocking a long stem glass over. These seem like a more accident free glass.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for a Martini
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses for a martini. They are a perfect size and they are easy to hold and sturdy. I think the overall quality is good for the price but there was a waviness to the rim.
customer_reviews.author: LetiA

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are real glass and not plastic. The weight is nice and they feel sturdy. They are bottom heavy so they won't tump over accidentally. and there is no stem to break. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Aydelotte

customer_reviews.title: Almost....
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice glasses, three are great but sadly one is so misshapen and leans terribly, we won’t use it and certainly wouldn’t serve guests with it. Not sending the whole set back so will just have 3 glasses. I should have examined the whole set before we used the first two.
customer_reviews.author: F. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: 8 oz OK but I prefer a smaller glass
customer_reviews.text: Martini glasses ok but not for me as I prefer a smaller amount of martini as 8 ounce is a pretty portent amount so half that size is fine for my liking but to each his own!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fashionable cocktail glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive cocktail glasses that seem to be of high quality. I've only used them a couple of times and my guests and I enjoyed them. The heavy base and no stem prevents spills.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Billings

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The cutomized glasses I made a friend turned out great! The vinyl adhered beautifully and she loved them!! I had received a set that was chipped during shipping. This wonderful company corrected the issue quickly and exceeded my expectations! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rust

customer_reviews.title: Almost great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, however one of the bottoms is not flat the glass rocks slightly when on a flat surface. Since I use to work in a glass factory I know it is within specs, just irritating for me because of working there. The specs of the glasses are on target and they are attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Dudding

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my friend that likes lemon drops. She loved them. I think they are a better option than the small stemmed glassware that can break easily. These have some thickness to them to be washed in a dishwasher and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dodge-Cummings

customer_reviews.title: JoyJolt 8ounce  Martini Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses. First of all, I ordered on Sunday and received them on Monday. It doesn't get any better than that. Truthfully, they were an impulse buy from amazon daily deals; but I'm so happy with them. The size is perfect. I used them as juice glasses for a brunch I had and they looked perfect. I also plan on using them for berries and cream and of course for martinis. Best impulse buy I had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mishi

customer_reviews.title: Great nightcap glass
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses to use for my evening drink. I enjoy a martini after dinner almost every weeknight, and enjoy moving around the house as I enjoy it. Drawback is I’m some what accident prone and me and stemware don’t mix! These glasses are sturdy and perf3 in size, last thing was they arrived packed well, and nothing was broken. I’ve had plenty of returns due to breakage from other companies, joyjolt does ship with the needed materials to get them to you in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Rims crooked or rough. EDIT: After returning these glasses, I received another set (just as bad) with a letter telling me a bad review can kill a business and asking me to delete my review. Uh, no, and I don’t want more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen E

customer_reviews.title: Very breakable and thin
customer_reviews.text: Cheap!! One came broken, the second one broke the while washing it the first time and the third one broke the first time using. Simply set it down gentle and it cracked. So bummed because they are beautiful, but not with the mess of glass clean up at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & customer support
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses and amazing customer support. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments on these glasses, they’re perfect for cocktails. Originally I had an issue with my order but they resolved it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Really nice glassware
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a dinner party I was having knowing that at least one guest was a martini drinker. I shy away from glasses on stems because I tend to be clumsy. These glasses are perfect. The size is perfect. At least one guest left saying they plan to order a set for themselves. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Kay

customer_reviews.title: We love them. I had been looking for martini glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: We love them. I had been looking for martini glasses without the long skinny stem. Then I saw these and read the reviews, which were all great. I add my 5 star review. I like that they are heavy at the bottom too. I have to say that I was impressed with the packaging of them too. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: FranC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE stemless glasses and these were the perfect addition to our summer barbecues and outdoor hangouts. Easy to hold and clean, and super durable. Plus, they look pretty and modern, too!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like these glasses, just wish it had a little bit more room in it. When you make a cocktail it goes to very top of the glass. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, but one was wobbly.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are heavy, attractive, and sturdy, but one of the four glasses was not level on the bottom, so it wobbles. If not for that, I would have given these glasses 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: nmlollipop

customer_reviews.title: guarantee by Joy Jolt.
customer_reviews.text: Joy Jolt Guarantees the customers satisfaction and happiness. I returned my original martini glasses due to condition they were in. Possibly due to a previous swap out by an unscrupulous customer. None the less, Joy Jolt resent me a new set of martini glasses that were what I expected, beautiful. Thank you! I love this new set plus the 2 extra ones I had been admiring. I am more than a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, one of the glasses was chipped. The larger Amazon box that the glasses were packed in, along with a couple other items, was not damaged, but the Amazon box was too big. Presumably, the box containing the JoyJolt glasses bounced around inside the larger box. I called Amazon, they are sending a replacement set of glasses. The glasses themselves are good enough. You can sort of see waves in the glass indicating not the best production, but they look sturdy and take less space than regular martini glasses.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Had to return these
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for some relatively cheap cosmopolitan glasses for a few weeks. I decided to order these, because I liked the modern design. When they came I was not happy with how cheap they looked, the glass was not consistent and as others have said there were some imperfections in the rim. I returned these, and found a nicer set at a local retailer for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and sturdiness of the glasses - you don't always get both. I would definitely recommend these. They'd make a nice house warming gift - or, like me, to buy for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: theowensfamily

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would've gotten what the pictures portrayed
customer_reviews.text: I must have received a bad batch. The rim on all the glasses had a noticeable lump on one side. Then what appeared to be a dusty film on the glasses were actually tiny scratches all over the glass making them look dingy and dirty. I don't consider myself a picky person, but I boxed them back up and returned them the same day for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Julesbergjones

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Martini glasses
customer_reviews.text: Appletini’s, Blood Orange martini’s...they all look and taste great in these glasses. Plus, I am a complete clutz so the short base means I never tip my drink over!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian W

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied and disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife along with the martini cocktail set. The martini set was amazing but these glasses, not so much. Not only were they all dirty but they also had stress cracks in them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and useful glasses.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is not too thin, I thinkk it will last in the dishwasher. The base is nicely weighted, for stability. Packaging was very good,they arrived safe and in a timely manner. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: a vid reader

customer_reviews.title: Broken item.
customer_reviews.text: I received my item in a timely fashion. However, one glass was broken when I opened the box. Lasership is the worse. Just received a replacement for my broken glass. Thank you so much. Wasn’t expecting it. Much appreciated.👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Delores Newton

product_meta.title: JoyJolt 4-Piece Afina Cocktail Glasses Set, Martini Glasses- 8-Ounces
feature_bullets: This cocktail glass set is a modern take on a classic glass. These 8-ounce Martini glasses are casual yet elegant with their cinched design. It has a heavy base elegant stemless construction that ensures stability.
Sturdy and strong enough for cosmopolitan cocktail bar glasses, or in areas where breakage of cocktail/martini glasses are a concern.
These JoyJolt Afina martini glasses set comes in a beautiful gift box, the perfect gift idea for any occasions.
This 8-ounce capacity is perfect for martinis and cosmo martini glasses, as well as layered liqueur, and mixed cocktails of any kind.
These martini glass are dishwasher save. 1-year satisfaction guarantee If they are damaged in any way upon arrival, we will send you a replacement set free of charge.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,309 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
